## union variable

Computes union of sets `a` and `b` and writes results to new set or optionally given set `out` (assumed to be empty for correct results).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
union: <T>(a: Set<T>, b: Set<T>, out?: Set<T> | undefined) => Set<T>
```
